content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. MIPS technology is definitely a valuable feature to consider when choosing a helmet, and it's great that you're prioritizing safety. Remember to also look for other important features like fit, ventilation, and certifications (like CPSC, Snell, or EN 1078) when making your decision.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. And don't forget to keep an eye out for those deals and discounts to get the most value for your money!

Stay safe on the roads and trails, and happy helmet shopping!
